results.title: Philip L. Sherman, Who Circumcised Thousands of Babies, Dies at 67
results.abstract: A mohel who became a boldface name, he said his record in 45 years of performing the Jewish religious rite was 11 in a single day (including two pairs of twins).

media.caption: Philip L. Sherman was a cantor and an occasional actor, but he was best known as a mohel. He performed tens of thousands of circumcisions in the New York area and beyond.
